text: Antoine Houbrechts (born 6 September 1943) is a retired Belgian road racing cyclist, who competed professionally between 1965 and 1981. He won the 1967 Volta a Portugal and 1968 Vuelta a Andalucía, and rode the Tour de France in 1968, 1970, 1972, 1973 and 1975. == References == Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian male cyclists Category:People from Tongeren Category:Sportspeople from Limburg (Belgium) Category:Volta a Portugal winners Category:Tour de France cyclists
title: Antoine Houbrechts
